info.name: NexusMods Redesign Redesigned
info.description: NexusMods is rolling out a new redesign of the site that uses far too much vertical space. This is an effort to reduce some of that 'above the fold' wasted space.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.4.1 - 
<dl>
	<dt>Global</dt>
		<dd>Fixed major issue on download pages where multiple downloads would not show the buttons.</dd>
		<dd>Fixed minor issue on download pages where the downloads could not be collapsed.</dd>
	</dt>
</dl>
v1.4 - 
<dl>
	<dt>Global</dt>
		<dd>Works on 'live' www domain as well as the rd domain</dd>
		<dd>Updated file download tabs for the slight redesign. Buttons now fixed distance from top of tab.</dd>
		<dd>Fixed log accordion items not being expanded by default</dd>
	</dt>
</dl>
v1.3 - 
<dl>
	<dt>Global</dt>
		<dd>Added a missing pop-up mode on the list view for searches</dd>
		<dd>Fixed search terms only roundifying the last term</dd>
	</dt>
</dl>
v1.2 - 
<dl>
	<dt>Files Page</dt>
		<dd>Logs tab accordions now start open by default (collapsing has no effect)</dd>
		<dd>Mod manage button in header is now accessible</dd>
	</dt>
</dl>
v1.1 - Shadows and Caps
<dl>
	<dt>Global</dt>
		<dd>All buttons now have text shadows</dd>
		<dd>Header fonts now use small caps instead of all caps</dd>
		<dd>File browsing lists now use an animated pop-up effect instead of the image overlay</dd>
	</dt>
</dl>
v1.0 - Initial release
<dl>
	<dt>Header Menu</dt>
		<dd>Optionally compact primary options</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
	<dt>Main Page</dt>
		<dd>Trending mods shows 3 large and 4 smaller images</dd>
		<dd>All trending mods show size, endorsements, and download count</dd>
		<dd>Image share made optional</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
	<dt>Mod Page</dt>
		<dd>Reduced banner image height</dd>
		<dd>Reduced height of image carousel</dd>
		<dd>Moved file info stats to right side of images</dd>
		<dd>Made tags fit all on one line</dd>
		<dd>
			<dl>
				<dt>Description Tab</dt>
					<dd>Moved info accordions to right side of About This Mod section</dd>
			</dl>
		</dd>
		<dd>
			<dl>
				<dt>Files Tab</dt>
					<dd>Moved download description to right side of block.</dd>
					<dd>Removed unnecessary headers</dd>
			</dl>
		</dd>
</dl>
